verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these חָ֥טְא֛וּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-te-'U had offended מַשְׁקֵ֥ה <S%H4945><s%> mash-Keh the cupbearer מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- of the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וְהָאֹפֶ֑ה <S%H644><s%> ve-ha-'o-Peh; and [his] baker לַאֲדֹנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H113><s%> la-'a-do-nei-Hem their lord לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech the king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַיִּקְצֹ֣ף <S%H7107><s%> vai-yik-Tzof was wroth פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al against שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei two סָרִיסָ֑יו <S%H5631><s%> sa-ri-Sav; [of] his officers עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> sar against the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֔ים <S%H4945><s%> ham-mash-Kim, cupbearer וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> sar and against the chief הָאוֹפִֽים׃ <S%H644><s%> ha-'o-Fim. of the bakers

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten And he put אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בְּמִשְׁמַ֗ר <S%H4929><s%> be-mish-Mar, them in ward בֵּ֛ית <S%H1004><s%> beit in the house שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> sar of the captain הַטַבָּחִ֖ים <S%H2876><s%> ha-tab-ba-Chim of the guard אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house הַסֹּ֑הַר <S%H5470><s%> has-So-har; prison מְק֕וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef where Joseph אָס֥וּר <S%H631><s%> 'a-Sur [was] bound שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. in it

וַ֠יִּפְקֹד <S%H6485><s%> Vai-yif-kod charged שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> sar And the captain הַטַּבָּחִ֧ים <S%H2876><s%> hat-tab-ba-Chim of the guard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Joseph אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam and he וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת <S%H8334><s%> vay-Sha-ret with them and he served אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam; וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim them and they continued a season בְּמִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H4929><s%> be-mish-Mar. in ward

וַיַּֽחַלְמוּ֩ <S%H2492><s%> vai-ya-chal-Mu And they dreamed חֲל֨וֹם <S%H2472><s%> cha-Lom a dream שְׁנֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem both of them אִ֤ישׁ <S%H582><s%> 'ish another חֲלֹמוֹ֙ <S%H2472><s%> cha-lo-Mo his dream בְּלַ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> be-Lay-lah night אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, in one אִ֖ישׁ <S%H582><s%> 'ish another כְּפִתְר֣וֹן <S%H6623><s%> ke-fit-Ron according to the interpretation חֲלֹמ֑וֹ <S%H2472><s%> cha-lo-Mo; of his dream הַמַּשְׁקֶ֣ה <S%H4945><s%> ham-mash-Keh the cupbearer וְהָאֹפֶ֗ה <S%H644><s%> ve-ha-'o-Peh, and the baker אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech of the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אֲסוּרִ֖ים <S%H631><s%> 'a-su-Rim which [were] bound בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit court הַסֹּֽהַר׃ <S%H5470><s%> has-So-har. prison

וַיָּבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came in אֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem when יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker; unto them in the morning וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and looked אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, וְהִנָּ֖ם <S%H2005><s%> ve-hin-Nam behold זֹעֲפִֽים׃ <S%H2196><s%> zo-'a-Fim. upon them and behold they [were] sad

וַיִּשְׁאַ֞ל <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'Al And he asked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- סְרִיסֵ֣י <S%H5631><s%> se-ri-Sei officers פַרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh, Pharaoh's אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֧וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To in בְמִשְׁמַ֛ר <S%H4929><s%> ve-mish-Mar that [were] with him in the ward בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house אֲדֹנָ֖יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav of his lord's לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying מַדּ֛וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' Why פְּנֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei-Chem Wherefore look רָעִ֖ים <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Im ye [so] sadly הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. age

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about חֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> cha-Lom a dream חָלַ֔מְנוּ <S%H2492><s%> cha-Lam-nu, unto him We have dreamed וּפֹתֵ֖ר <S%H6622><s%> u-fo-Ter and [there is] no interpreter אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein and there אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem about יוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, of it And Joseph הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not לֵֽאלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him angels פִּתְרֹנִ֔ים <S%H6623><s%> pit-ro-Nim, unto them [Do] not interpretations סַפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> sap-pe-ru- commune נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> na please לִֽי׃ Li.

וַיְסַפֵּ֧ר <S%H5608><s%> vay-sap-Per told שַֽׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- And the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֛ים <S%H4945><s%> ham-mash-Kim cupbearer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲלֹמ֖וֹ <S%H2472><s%> cha-lo-Mo his dream לְיוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> le-yo-Sef; to Joseph וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said ל֔וֹ lo, בַּחֲלוֹמִ֕י <S%H2472><s%> ba-cha-lo-Mi to him In my dream וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- behold גֶ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> Ge-fen behold a vine לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai. [was] before me

וּבַגֶּ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> u-vag-Ge-fen And in the vine שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah [were] three שָׂרִיגִ֑ם <S%H8299><s%> sa-ri-Gim; branches וְהִ֤יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi it was כְפֹרַ֙חַת֙ <S%H6524><s%> che-fo-Ra-chat and it [was] as though it budded עָלְתָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> 'al-Tah shot forth נִצָּ֔הּ <S%H5322><s%> nitz-Tzah, [and] her blossoms הִבְשִׁ֥ילוּ <S%H1310><s%> hiv-Shi-lu thereof brought forth ripe אַשְׁכְּלֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H811><s%> 'ash-ke-lo-Tei-ha and the clusters עֲנָבִֽים׃ <S%H6025><s%> 'a-na-Vim. grapes

וְכ֥וֹס <S%H3563><s%> ve-Chos cup פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh And Pharaoh's בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di; [was] in my hand וָאֶקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> va-'ek-Kach and I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽעֲנָבִ֗ים <S%H6025><s%> ha-'a-na-Vim, the grapes וָֽאֶשְׂחַ֤ט <S%H7818><s%> va-'es-Chat and pressed אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about כּ֣וֹס <S%H3563><s%> Kos cup פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, them into Pharaoh's וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-Ten and I gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכּ֖וֹס <S%H3563><s%> hak-Kos the cup עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> kaf hand פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh. into Pharaoh's

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לוֹ֙ lo יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, And Joseph זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This פִּתְרֹנ֑וֹ <S%H6623><s%> pit-ro-No; unto him This [is] the interpretation שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet of it The three הַשָּׂ֣רִגִ֔ים <S%H8299><s%> has-Sa-ri-Gim, branches שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet [are] three יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days הֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem. like

בְּע֣וֹד׀ <S%H5750><s%> be-'od Yet שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet within three יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim, days יִשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa lift up פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh shall Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹאשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H7218><s%> ro-She-cha, thine head וַהֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֖ <S%H7725><s%> va-ha-shi-ve-Cha and restore עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כַּנֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3653><s%> kan-Ne-cha; thee unto thy place וְנָתַתָּ֤ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-ta-Ta and thou shalt deliver כוֹס־ <S%H3563><s%> chos- cup פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh Pharaoh's בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do, into his hand כַּמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> kam-mish-Pat manner הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, after the former אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher when הָיִ֖יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ta become מַשְׁקֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4945><s%> mash-Ke-hu. were his cupbearer

כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo זְכַרְתַּ֣נִי <S%H2142><s%> ze-char-Ta-ni But think אִתְּךָ֗ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Cha, for כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher it יִ֣יטַב <S%H3190><s%> Yi-tav on me when it shall be well לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְעָשִֽׂיתָ־ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-si-ta- with thee and shew נָּ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na and please עִמָּדִ֖י <S%H5978><s%> 'im-ma-Di me חָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Cha-sed; kindness וְהִזְכַּרְתַּ֙נִי֙ <S%H2142><s%> ve-hiz-kar-Ta-ni I pray thee unto me and make mention אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, of me unto Pharaoh וְהוֹצֵאתַ֖נִי <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Ta-ni and bring me מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit out of this house הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. of this

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גֻנֹּ֣ב <S%H1589><s%> gun-No For indeed I was stolen away גֻּנַּ֔בְתִּי <S%H1589><s%> gun-Nav-ti, kidnapped מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land הָעִבְרִ֑ים <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-Rim; of the Hebrews וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and even פֹּה֙ <S%H6311><s%> poh here לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not עָשִׂ֣יתִֽי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti and here also have I done מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> me-'U-mah, nothing כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- should שָׂמ֥וּ <S%H7760><s%> sa-Mu that they should put אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti בַּבּֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> bab-Bor. me into the dungeon

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- When the chief הָאֹפִ֖ים <S%H644><s%> ha-'o-Fim baker כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov was good פָּתָ֑ר <S%H6622><s%> pa-Tar; that the interpretation וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, unto Joseph אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- I also אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I בַּחֲלוֹמִ֔י <S%H2472><s%> ba-cha-lo-Mi, [was] in my dream וְהִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh, and behold שְׁלֹשָׁ֛ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah and behold [I had] three סַלֵּ֥י <S%H5536><s%> sal-Lei baskets חֹרִ֖י <S%H2751><s%> cho-Ri white עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi. on my head

וּבַסַּ֣ל <S%H5536><s%> u-vas-Sal basket הָֽעֶלְי֔וֹן <S%H5945><s%> ha-'el-yOn, And in the uppermost מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol of all מַאֲכַ֥ל <S%H3978><s%> ma-'a-Chal [there was] of all manner פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh for Pharaoh מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh act אֹפֶ֑ה <S%H644><s%> o-Peh; of baked וְהָע֗וֹף <S%H5775><s%> ve-ha-'of, and the birds אֹכֵ֥ל <S%H398><s%> 'o-Chel did eat אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- some הַסַּ֖ל <S%H5536><s%> has-Sal them out of the basket מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al upon רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi. my head
